raw_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-raw@' + storage_account  
raw_storage_source_folder = 'appeal'
raw_storage_source_name = 'dim_appeal_combined.csv'
curated_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-curated@' + storage_account
curated_storage_folder = 'appeal'
curated_storage_table_name = 'dim_appeal_combined'
curated_database_name = 'odw_curated_db'

from pyspark.sql.types import *

raw_storage_folder_path = raw_storage_container   + '/' + raw_storage_source_folder + '/' + raw_storage_source_name
curated_storage_folder_path = curated_storage_container + '/' + curated_storage_folder + '/' + curated_storage_table_name

rawsourceDF=spark.read.options(header='True', inferSchema='True', lineSep="ยง", quote="\"", escape="\\", quoteAll="true").csv(raw_storage_folder_path)

#Rename Columns with illegal Parquet characters
import re
cols=[re.sub("( |\#|\# |\.|\(|\)|\/)","_",i) for i in rawsourceDF.columns] # replace chars with _
cols=[re.sub("([\_]{2,})","_",i) for i in cols] #replace consecutive _ with one _
cols=[re.sub("(\_)$","",i) for i in cols] #remove trailing _
rawsourceDF=rawsourceDF.toDF(*cols)

rawsourceDF.write.option("header", "true").format('parquet').mode('overwrite').save(curated_storage_folder_path)

spark.sql("DROP TABLE {0}.{1}".format(curated_database_name,curated_storage_table_name))
spark.sql("CREATE TABLE {0}.{1} USING PARQUET LOCATION '{2}' ".format(curated_database_name,curated_storage_table_name,curated_storage_folder_path))
